content: repeat 11 more times omitting the last 2sc join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not fa sten off stitch count 24fptrc 48sc round 24 white ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in each st around join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch f asten off and secure ends stitch count 72hdc round 25 green join in any st ch3 1 double_crochet in same st this counts as the 1st v-st skip 2 sts v-st in next st repeat 22 more times join in the 2nd chain of the ch3 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 24v-sts 11 round 26 white join in the 1st double_crochet of any v-st ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st work 1 spike st into the same st that the v-st from round 25 was worked into 1sc in each of the next 2 sts repeat 23 more times omitting the last single_crochet join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch c ount 24spike sts 48sc note for rounds 27-32 instead of fastening off after every round you can simply change colours and car ry the other colour up after each round in this case ch2 at the start of the round with the new colour this will count as the first fpdc continue working the round ensuring to work fpdc s around the fpdc s from the previous round and bpdc s around the bpdc s from the previous round round 27 red join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in each st around join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch c ount 72 half_double_crochet round 28 green join around the post of any st with a standing fpdc 1bpdc around the next st 1fpdc around the next st 1bpdc around the next st repeat 34 more times join to the top of the beginning fpdc with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 36fpdc 36bpdc round 29 red join around the post of any fpdc with a standing fpdc 1bpdc around the next st 1fpdc around the next st 1bpdc around the next st repeat 34 more times join to the top of the beginning fpdc wi th a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 36fpdc 36bpdc 12 round 30 green join around the post of any fpdc with a standing fpdc 1bpdc around the next st 1fpdc around the next st 1bpdc around the next st repeat 34 more times join to the top of the beginning fpdc with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 36fpdc 36bpdc round 31 red join around the post of any fpdc with a standing fpdc 1bpdc around the next st 1fpdc around the next st 1bpdc around the next st repeat 34 more times join to the top of the beginning fpdc
